channel.title: Cant seem to play the game
channel.description:
Hello. Since this is my first post I will briefly introduce myself. I used to play Runescaoe some time ago off and on depending if I had access to the internet. The last year I was playing Runescape I got increasingly fustrated with the direction the updates were going. The last straw for me to quit was the squeal of fortune and I am now just wait for Jagex to get sued, fined for violating international gambling laws.
Anywho, I discovered Morparscape recently but am not able to play the game at all. At first I had a white screen on the game with the backround music playing. I reloaded the page and it showed the proper login page, but when a scroll up or down it parts of the log in screen flash white then revert to normal. I am not sure if this is something that should happen but I am just taking note of it in case the info helps.
I noticed that it freezes when I put only 1 character for both a username and password but seems to work when I put more characters in.
When I attempt to log into the game (port 127.0.0.1) I cant get in. I would copy down the exact message but I tried to log in while typing this and now I have a message of "Sorry, an error has accrued whilst loading Runescape". When I go over to the tab where it is (I am using Firefox by the way) it turns grey for about a second before displaying the error.
Also I am using Windows 7 64 pro 64bit
I am happy to supply any information to help resolve this problem with in reason. Please also keep in mind that I am not an expert with computers or OS so if the problem solving you suggest may be a little advanced, then please provide step by step.
I noticed that is seems to freeze when I put only 1 letter for both the password and username. -------------------- I just had the ladder error message displayed once again but this time the back round is light gray as opposed to black. -------------------- Reloading the site is constantly results in the ladder error. This happened after I cleared my browsing history, cookies, ect ------------------- Forgot to mention that I also updated my java because my first error was something to do with my java plugin. Have not had that error sense however. -------------------- I went to the MoparScape 4.0 link and it got me further. I used the default port and was able to reach the login screen after it downloaded cache. When I try to log in it gives me an error message "error connecting to server" --------------- I was able to finally log into the 4.0 Moparscape. Now I am just curious as to how to munipulate my skill levels, looks ect, or find a server that starts you out at just level 1 for all skills (except health) But I do believe that is for anther topic and I am sure a tutorial exists on this forum for what I am looking for.

item.title: Cant seem to play the game
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

What happens when you click the compile.bat? and 127.0.0.1 means you’re connecting to the localhost.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant seem to play the game

item.title: Cant seem to play the game
item.dc:creator: @Beast1233 Beast1233
item.description:
@Beast1233 wrote:

Camballer:

[quote]We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help.

Have you made sure all ip’s are set to 127.0.0.1 in the client? Have you made sure it successfully compiled? Have you made sure the server was and is running smoothly?[/quote]

If I understand correctly (and if I dont please do correct me) 127.0.0.1 is connecting to my own computer. It is also the only server I have attempted to connect to. I am not sure how to make sure it is successfully compiled or if all ips are set to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
item.source: Cant seem to play the game

item.title: Cant seem to play the game
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help.

Have you made sure all ip’s are set to 127.0.0.1 in the client? Have you made sure it successfully compiled? Have you made sure the server was and is running smoothly?

Read full topic

item.title: Cant seem to play the game
item.dc:creator: @Beast1233 Beast1233
item.description:
@Beast1233 wrote:

Hello. Since this is my first post I will briefly introduce myself. I used to play Runescaoe some time ago off and on depending if I had access to the internet. The last year I was playing Runescape I got increasingly fustrated with the direction the updates were going. The last straw for me to quit was the squeal of fortune and I am now just wait for Jagex to get sued, fined for violating international gambling laws.

Anywho, I discovered Morparscape recently but am not able to play the game at all. At first I had a white screen on the game with the backround music playing. I reloaded the page and it showed the proper login page, but when a scroll up or down it parts of the log in screen flash white then revert to normal. I am not sure if this is something that should happen but I am just taking note of it in case the info helps.

I noticed that it freezes when I put only 1 character for both a username and password but seems to work when I put more characters in.

When I attempt to log into the game (port 127.0.0.1) I cant get in. I would copy down the exact message but I tried to log in while typing this and now I have a message of “Sorry, an error has accrued whilst loading Runescape”. When I go over to the tab where it is (I am using Firefox by the way) it turns grey for about a second before displaying the error.

Also I am using Windows 7 64 pro 64bit

I am happy to supply any information to help resolve this problem with in reason. Please also keep in mind that I am not an expert with computers or OS so if the problem solving you suggest may be a little advanced, then please provide step by step.

I noticed that is seems to freeze when I put only 1 letter for both the password and username.

I just had the ladder error message displayed once again but this time the back round is light gray as opposed to black.

Reloading the site is constantly results in the ladder error. This happened after I cleared my browsing history, cookies, ect

Forgot to mention that I also updated my java because my first error was something to do with my java plugin. Have not had that error sense however.

I went to the MoparScape 4.0 link and it got me further. I used the default port and was able to reach the login screen after it downloaded cache. When I try to log in it gives me an error message “error connecting to server”

I was able to finally log into the 4.0 Moparscape. Now I am just curious as to how to munipulate my skill levels, looks ect, or find a server that starts you out at just level 1 for all skills (except health) But I do believe that is for anther topic and I am sure a tutorial exists on this forum for what I am looking for.

Read full topic
